nodes.text: Crix Exohusker was a member of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

Crix Exohusker first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures, in the mini game "Galactic Forces" whenever playing as the Grand Army of the Republic, in singleplayer. Crix's species and gender are unknown, as they do not directly appear.
Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures – "Galactic Forces" (First mentioned)
